WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 0530Z TO 1530Z DAILY
   28 APR THRU 27 MAY EXCEPT SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   39-42.84N 008-26.78E, 39-42.84N 008-23.18E,
   39-44.34N 008-22.48E, 39-46.04N 008-22.68E,
   39-47.54N 008-23.78E, 39-48.54N 008-25.18E,
   39-49.04N 008-27.98E, 39-48.14N 008-29.98E,
   39-44.24N 008-28.88E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 271630Z MAY 22.
